io.straas.android.sdk.circall

Class CircallPlayConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.straas.android.sdk.circall.CircallPlayConfig

  • public class CircallPlayConfig
extends Object
    CircallPlayConfig is used in CircallManager.prepareForCameraCapture(io.straas.android.sdk.circall.CircallConfig, io.straas.android.sdk.circall.CircallPlayerView, io.straas.android.sdk.circall.CircallPlayConfig).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CircallPlayConfig.Builder 
      static interface  CircallPlayConfig.SCALING_MODE
      Scaling modes, including ASPECT_FIT, ASPECT_FILL and FILL

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ASPECT_FILL
      Video frame is scaled to fill the size of the view by maintaining the aspect ratio.
      static int ASPECT_FIT
      Video frame is scaled to fit the size of the view by maintaining the aspect ratio (black borders may be displayed).
      static int FILL
      Video frame is scaled to fill the size of the view.

    • Field Detail

      • ASPECT_FIT

        public static final int ASPECT_FIT
        Video frame is scaled to fit the size of the view by maintaining the aspect ratio (black borders may be displayed).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASPECT_FILL

        public static final int ASPECT_FILL
        Video frame is scaled to fill the size of the view by maintaining the aspect ratio. Some portion of the video frame may be clipped.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILL

        public static final int FILL
        Video frame is scaled to fill the size of the view. This may change the aspect ratio of the frame src.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getScalingMode

        public int getScalingMode()
        Get the default scaling mode.
        Returns:
        Default scaling mode. See CircallPlayConfig.SCALING_MODE.
        See Also:
        CircallPlayConfig.Builder.scalingMode(int)
